## Failure Scenarios

### Scenario 1: Linting Failure
```
Frontend Quality â†’ ESLint Fails âŒ
                    â†“
              Pipeline Fails âŒ
                    â†“
         PR blocked from merge
```

### Scenario 2: Coverage Below Threshold
```
Python Quality â†’ Pytest Runs âœ…
                    â†“
              Coverage 75% âŒ
                    â†“
         Coverage Gate Fails âŒ
                    â†“
         PR blocked from merge
```

### Scenario 3: Type Checking Failure
```
Python Quality â†’ MyPy Strict âŒ
                    â†“
         Type errors detected
                    â†“
         PR blocked from merge
```

### Scenario 4: E2E Test Failure
```
E2E Tests â†’ Playwright Fails âŒ
                    â†“
        Quality Gate Fails âŒ
                    â†“
      PR blocked from merge
```

```
    â””â”€ Ruff lint passed

    â””â”€ Pytest passed (82% coverage)
```

## Legend

```
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”“  Required job (hard fail)
â”ƒ            â”ƒ
â”—â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”›

    â–¼          Flow direction

    â”œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€    Split/Branch

âœ… Success     Passed check
âŒ Failure     Failed check
âš ï¸  Warning    Warning state
```
